# <a name="insert-a-picture-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="71845-102">Umetanje slike u Outlook na Webu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71845-102">Insert a picture in Outlook on the web</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71845-103">Ako želite da dodate sliku koja se prikazuje u telu e-poruke, možete dodati umetnutu sliku.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71845-103">If you want to add an image that displays in the body of your email, you can add an inline image.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="71845-104">Potvrdite izbor u polju</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71845-104">Select the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="71845-105">**Umetanje slika umetnutih** na dno okna za pisanje.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71845-105">**Insert pictures inline** at the bottom of the compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="71845-106">Potražite lokaciju slike na računaru, izaberite je, a zatim kliknite na dugme **Otvori**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71845-106">Browse to the location of the picture on your computer, select it, and then select **Open**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="71845-107">Da biste saznali više o drugim načinima personalizacije poruke, pogledajte odeljak [Prilagođavanje e-poruke u programu Outlook na vebu](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="71845-107">To learn about other ways to personalize your message, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
